content: I stumbled upon a project that cannot release because they need a new release fo packed_simd, what are the blockers?

@Luca Barbato can you mention the project ? Firefox is another project relying on this, and I wanted to sync with @nikomatsakis about it in the near future. Maybe we can release a minimum thing in early 2020.
https://github.com/seijikun/kmean-rs I might experiment with it with rav1e as well later.
It would be great if next release had removed internal use of MMX.
